events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago but my package still hasn't arrived, and the tracking information shows no updates.
The issue has been identified as a potential delivery delay based on the customer's description of missing tracking updates and late arrival.
The case has been assigned to a customer service representative specialized in delivery and shipping issues.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your delayed shipment. I’m here to help resolve this issue for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so I can investigate this delay further?
Sure, the order number is 123456789 and the tracking number is TRACK987654. The last update on the courier’s site was five days ago.
I have contacted the courier service and they confirmed a delay due to weather conditions. We can offer a full tracking update and an expedited reshipment if the package is lost.
Thank you for the update and the offer. I appreciate the proactive communication and would like to proceed with the expedited reshipment.
Your new shipment has been arranged and should be delivered within 3 business days. We will send you the new tracking details shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your package and that everything is satisfactory with the delivery now.
Yes, the package arrived yesterday and everything is in perfect condition. Thanks again for your help and quick follow-up!
We are glad your issue has been resolved successfully. We are closing this case now but feel free to contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
